Title: AeroGlassProvider
Description: AeroGlassProvider simplifies extending Windows Vista Aero Glass onto the surface of a WinForms Form. It is developed in C#. AeroGlassProvider is a custom component which implements an IExtenderProvider interface to provide additional Form properties.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
AeroGlassProvider simplifies extending Windows Vista Aero Glass onto the surface of a WinForms Form. It is developed in C#. AeroGlassProvider is a custom component which implements an IExtenderProvider interface to provide additional Form properties.

AeroGlassProvider also simplifies drawing images and text onto the glass. Text is drawn with a "glow" effect which helps distinguish the text from a complex glass background.
